categorySection.ev_chargers_description: Portable and wall-mounted chargers for all EVs

items.title: How can I make a payment?
items.text: You can use a bank transfer to the provided account number at Bank of Georgia or TBC Bank. Please consult with us at the given phone number before making a purchase.

items.title: How reliable is the offered product quality?
items.text: All products are certified and factory-tested. You can also test the device you intend to purchase at our store. Quality is guaranteed.

items.title: Do you deliver to regions?
items.text: Yes, delivery to regions is possible upon prior agreement. Express delivery is also available.

items.title: Do you have branches in regions?
items.text: At this stage, we only have a store in Tbilisi. In the future, we plan to open new stores in major cities.
